solution_line_template: If he grows {total_plants_grown} plants with {seed_packets_used} seed packets, he grows {total_plants_grown}/{seed_packets_used}=<<{total_plants_grown}/{seed_packets_used}={plants_per_packet}>>{plants_per_packet} plants with 1 seed packet.
Since 1 seed packet grows {plants_per_packet} plants, he'll need {additional_packets_needed} more to make the plants {target_plants}.
